Taxi Edges

Source: vignettes/Taxi-Edges.Rmd
Taxi-Edges.Rmd

For full description, see this link

library(shinyCyJS)
  shinyCyJS(
    list(
      buildNode("A"), 
      buildNode("B"), 
      buildNode("C"), 
      buildEdge("A", "B", curveStyle = "taxi"), 
      buildEdge("A", "C", curveStyle = "taxi")
    )
  )
